title: Improve error handling for network failures and invalid API keys
description: Add robust error handling: (1) Catch network timeouts and show friendly retry messages, (2) Detect invalid/expired API keys and prompt user to run mx-lite setup, (3) Handle YouTube search failures gracefully (skip song, continue), (4) Add --verbose flag for debug output. Create tests for each error path.
acceptance_criteria: Network timeout shows friendly message with retry suggestion
Invalid API key detected and user prompted to reconfigure
YouTube search failures skip gracefully instead of crashing
